title: can't open hextech chest crafting page
body: So i can't open hextech chest crafting page, because when i open it, my leagueoflegends profile crashes. Can u help me?

replies.body:
Okay, found the issue! It's all to do with programs that have overlays! Close Plays.tv, Discord, Overwolf etc. Worked 100% for a lot of people myself included.
[Source/Credit](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4xsj1t/client_crashing_after_opening_hextech_crafting/d6i2iwm)
ye, i had plays.tv but idk how did i got that program.

A recent update with windows may have caused some players an issue with their client crashing while opening hextech.  We're currently looking into this, but in the meantime [rolling back your update](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) might help with this.  Hopefully, this will get you back in the game!
